description: It allows you to request async data, store them in redux state and connect them to your react component.

name: redux-connect

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:es
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=es babel --out-dir es modules
scripts.postversion: npm publish && git push && git push --tags
